data.markdown:
## Description The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently. ## K 4 WCM PREMIUM HOME Der K 4 WCM Premium Home mit wassergekühltem Motor ist ideal für mittelstarke Verschmutzungen auf Terrassen, Gartenmöbeln und Autos geeignet. Inkl. Schlauchtrommel und Home Kit. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.324-232.0 ## Text - Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278999104
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 130 / 2 - max. 13
Fördermenge l/h max. 420
Flächenleistung m³/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1,8
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 12
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 17,3
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 369 × 389 × 901
## Ausstattung
Home Kit Flächenreiniger T 5, Stein- und Fassadenreiniger, 3in1, 1 l
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
Integrierte HD-Schlauchtrommel [x]
HD-Schlauch m 6
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Wassergekühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
## Description The image displays a pressure washer set, which includes several components: 1. **Main Unit**: - The central piece is a yellow and black pressure washer. It has a compact, upright design with a handle on top for easy transportation. The body is predominantly yellow with black accents. There are two wheels at the base for mobility. 2. **Accessories**: - **Spray Gun**: A black spray gun with a trigger handle, designed to connect to the main unit for directing water flow. - **Lance Attachments**: Two different lance attachments are included, each with a different nozzle type for varied spray patterns and pressure levels. - **Surface Cleaner**: A circular surface cleaner attachment, primarily yellow with black detailing, used for cleaning flat surfaces like patios or driveways. - **Detergent Bottle**: A small bottle of detergent, labeled for use with the pressure washer, to enhance cleaning performance. 3. **Design and Functionality**: - The pressure washer is designed for home use, suitable for cleaning vehicles, outdoor furniture, and surfaces. - The components are designed to be easily attachable and detachable, providing versatility in cleaning tasks. This set is ideal for users looking for a comprehensive cleaning solution with multiple attachments for different cleaning needs. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Description The image is a cropped section from a document, featuring a bold, attention-grabbing design. It includes the following elements: - A large numeral "1" in a light gray color, serving as a background or watermark. - Overlaid on the numeral is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. - Inside the arrow, the text reads: ``` WORLD'S NO. 1 PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND ``` - The text is in uppercase, with "WORLD'S NO. 1" and "PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND" stacked vertically. - The font is bold and black, contrasting sharply with the yellow background for high visibility. - The design suggests a promotional or advertising context, emphasizing the brand's leading position in the market. ## Description of the Image The image is a logo for the "iF Design Award 2023." It consists of two main parts: 1. **Top Section**: - A red square with the white lowercase letters "iF" prominently displayed. The letters are bold and centered within the square. 2. **Bottom Section**: - Below the red square, there is a rectangular red background with the text "DESIGN AWARD 2023" in white, capitalized letters. The text is aligned to the center. The overall design is simple and modern, using a bold red and white color scheme to convey a sense of prestige and recognition associated with the award. ## Description The image is a logo for the "Red Dot Design Award" with the text "red dot winner 2023" below it. The logo consists of a red sphere with a white swirl pattern, symbolizing the prestigious design award. The text is in lowercase, with "red dot" in red and "winner 2023" in gray. This award is known for recognizing high-quality design and innovation. ## Description The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape resembling a speech bubble or a stylized map of Europe. Inside this shape, there is a circle of 12 yellow stars, which is a symbol commonly associated with the European Union. Below the shape, the text reads "Made in Europe." This logo likely indicates that a product is manufactured within Europe, emphasizing European origin and quality standards. The use of the EU stars suggests a connection to the European Union, possibly implying compliance with EU regulations or standards.

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently.

## K 4 WCM PREMIUM HOME

Der K 4 WCM Premium Home mit wassergekühltem Motor ist ideal für mittelstarke Verschmutzungen auf Terrassen, Gartenmöbeln und Autos geeignet. Inkl. Schlauchtrommel und Home Kit.

## Text

- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor
- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278999104
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 130 / 2 - max. 13
Fördermenge l/h max. 420
Flächenleistung m³/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1,8
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 12
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 17,3
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 369 × 389 × 901

## Ausstattung
Home Kit Flächenreiniger T 5, Stein- und Fassadenreiniger, 3in1, 1 l
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
Integrierte HD-Schlauchtrommel [x]
HD-Schlauch m 6
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Wassergekühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]

## Description

The image displays a pressure washer set, which includes several components:

1. **Main Unit**: 
   - The central piece is a yellow and black pressure washer. It has a compact, upright design with a handle on top for easy transportation. The body is predominantly yellow with black accents. There are two wheels at the base for mobility.

2. **Accessories**:
   - **Spray Gun**: A black spray gun with a trigger handle, designed to connect to the main unit for directing water flow.
   - **Lance Attachments**: Two different lance attachments are included, each with a different nozzle type for varied spray patterns and pressure levels.
   - **Surface Cleaner**: A circular surface cleaner attachment, primarily yellow with black detailing, used for cleaning flat surfaces like patios or driveways.
   - **Detergent Bottle**: A small bottle of detergent, labeled for use with the pressure washer, to enhance cleaning performance.

3. **Design and Functionality**:
   - The pressure washer is designed for home use, suitable for cleaning vehicles, outdoor furniture, and surfaces.
   - The components are designed to be easily attachable and detachable, providing versatility in cleaning tasks.

This set is ideal for users looking for a comprehensive cleaning solution with multiple attachments for different cleaning needs.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Description

The image is a cropped section from a document, featuring a bold, attention-grabbing design. It includes the following elements:

- A large numeral "1" in a light gray color, serving as a background or watermark.
- Overlaid on the numeral is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right.
- Inside the arrow, the text reads:

  ```
  WORLD'S
  NO. 1
  PRE-SLICE
  SANDWICH
  BRAND
  ```

- The text is in uppercase, with "WORLD'S NO. 1" and "PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND" stacked vertically.
- The font is bold and black, contrasting sharply with the yellow background for high visibility.
- The design suggests a promotional or advertising context, emphasizing the brand's leading position in the market.

## Description of the Image

The image is a logo for the "iF Design Award 2023." It consists of two main parts:

1. **Top Section**: 
   - A red square with the white lowercase letters "iF" prominently displayed. The letters are bold and centered within the square.

2. **Bottom Section**:
   - Below the red square, there is a rectangular red background with the text "DESIGN AWARD 2023" in white, capitalized letters. The text is aligned to the center.

The overall design is simple and modern, using a bold red and white color scheme to convey a sense of prestige and recognition associated with the award.

## Description

The image is a logo for the "Red Dot Design Award" with the text "red dot winner 2023" below it. The logo consists of a red sphere with a white swirl pattern, symbolizing the prestigious design award. The text is in lowercase, with "red dot" in red and "winner 2023" in gray. This award is known for recognizing high-quality design and innovation.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape resembling a speech bubble or a stylized map of Europe. Inside this shape, there is a circle of 12 yellow stars, which is a symbol commonly associated with the European Union. Below the shape, the text reads "Made in Europe." 

This logo likely indicates that a product is manufactured within Europe, emphasizing European origin and quality standards. The use of the EU stars suggests a connection to the European Union, possibly implying compliance with EU regulations or standards.
